list.name: Host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jboss.jvm_memory" WITH KEY = "host"

list.name: Datasource
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jboss.datasource.pool" WITH KEY = "data-source" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.label: Garbage Collector
list.name: GC
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jboss.jvm_garbage_collector" WITH KEY = "name"

list.name: MemoryPool
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jboss.jvm_memory_pool" WITH KEY = "pool_name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
